name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. William Franklin BRAHAM

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. William Franklin BRAHAM.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John C. Pettit, Dist. Atty., Frank C. Roney, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., Washington, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
521 A.2d 1392
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. William Franklin BRAHAM.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 12, 1987.
Decided March 23, 1987.
John C. Pettit, Dist. Atty., Frank C. Roney, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., Washington, for appellant.
Robert C. Brady, Washington, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
